H0.text: Which word is used for the letter U in the phonetic alphabet. Umpire

H1.text: Which word is used for the letter U in the phonetic alphabet. Ukulele

H2.text: Which word is used for the letter U in the phonetic alphabet. Unicorn

H3.text: Which word is used for the letter U in the phonetic alphabet. Uniform

A4.text: For similar reasons, Charlie and Uniform have alternative pronunciations where the ch is pronounced 'sh' and the u is pronounced 'oo'.
